subdisciplines.name: Animation
subdisciplines.description: The creation of moving images using computers, graphics, and other media technologies.

subdisciplines.name: Game Design
subdisciplines.description: The design and development of video games using computer programs and creative design.

subdisciplines.name: Graphic Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of visual communication and problem-solving through the use of typography, photography, and illustration.

subdisciplines.name: Interactive Media
subdisciplines.description: The creation of digital experiences that allow user interaction with media content.

subdisciplines.name: Web Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of designing and creating websites, including layout, usability, and visual aesthetics.

subdisciplines.name: Animation
subdisciplines.description: The creation of visual effects and motion graphics by means of computer-generated imagery or animations.

subdisciplines.name: Game Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of creating the content and rules of a game, including the overall concept, storyline, characters, and game mechanics.

subdisciplines.name: Interactive Media
subdisciplines.description: The design and creation of user-centered digital experiences that respond to user actions and inputs.

subdisciplines.name: Mobile Media
subdisciplines.description: The creation of content specifically designed for mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

subdisciplines.name: Video Production
subdisciplines.description: The conceptualization, production, and post-production of video content for various applications, including advertising, educational and informative.
